name: Beach Fun: Summer Challenge
overview: Sunshine, beaches, the ocean - a paradise for your living room! Discover Coral Island and take part in varied competitions set in tropical surroundings. The ultimate fun sports collection, guaranteed to give you that holiday feeling! - Six fun sports: Beach tennis, flying discs, water skiing, kiting, crazy golf and boules. - Great multiplayer modes playable with 2 friends simultaneously, or turn-based with 4 players
